column3: On a busy node (read: any node that accepts incoming connections), this reduces a _lot_ of log spam.\n

<s>I can't seem to find evidence that we've fixed the issue where nodes will repeatedly re-get txn that they've rejected. Verbosity here is pretty good for troubleshooting that sort of stuff. </s> Edit:  I was apparently not paying attention here and thought it would silence most of the (sent) getdatas log messages, ignore me.\n
